Restaurant Bar & Music Hall

Henry’s is centrally located in historic downtown Charleston at 54 North Market Street, across from the Charleston city market. Established in 1932, Henry’s is the oldest continuous restaurant in Charleston and the state of South Carolina.
Read more about us Groups & parties 
Tailored events for all occasions

Create memories to last a lifetime with our personalized private party options. Let our team help you plan an unforgettable celebration.

Reviews
Start stop reviews carousel 
Review by - Google

Rebecca L:
five star review by 
Oldest restaurant in CHS; Live music nightly; outstanding service, great atmosphere, and delicious food; try the She soup, best chicken salad sandwich I have ever ate

Review by - Google

Aldo P:
five star review by 
Comfortable atmosphere. The old fashion is excellent made with Ben&Steal local whiskey. Roof top Bar keeps it more of a quiet experience.

Review by - Google

Les H:
five star review by 
Great place to stop in for a bite to eat. Service and food was excellent, and being the oldest running restaurant it's a cool piece of history. Would definitely come back next time in town.

Review by - Google

Philip C:
five star review by 
What a great venue multiple levels of bars music restaurants great drinks great service beautiful vibe Great atmosphere.

Review by - Google

Susan D:
five star review by 
Recently did a girls trip to Charleston and discovered this place. We loved it so much we went 3 times! Delicious jambalaya and the rum punch is amazing!
